alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 12:40PM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain possible. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 above zero. * WHERE...Portions of southern Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM Tuesday to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, particularly bridges, overpasses, and lesser traveled secondary roads, may become slippery. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute overnight and Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as rain this afternoon and evening, but as temperatures quickly fall tonight, there will be a very brief opportunity for freezing rain mainly late tonight and early Tuesday morning. The freezing rain threat will end before sunrise but some spots may remain icy during the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
